page.title: 07Delrow College
page.content: Delrow College and rehabilitation centre is located in square 05140197 in the settlement of Patchetts Green. Delrow House dates from the 17th Century and still has a delightful Jacobean stone fireplace. The site covers 30 acres and has been developed with educational and residential buildings of mixed architectural merit since the Camphill Village Trust aquired the site in l963. The trust,founded by Dr.Karl Konig, provides private non-profit making institutions to which children, suffering from a wide variety of handicaps and disturbances can be referred. They receive care, treatment and education until they are of school leaving age. The rehabilitation centre runs as an integral community in which staff and children live together in households.
